visual.name: GlobeMap
visual.description:
A 3D visual using WebGL for plotting locations, with category values displayed as bar heights and heat maps.

Shift+Click on bar to change center point. 
Slicing data points will animate to average location.

Attributions:
three.js - https://github.com/mrdoob/three.js/
webgl-heatmap - https://github.com/pyalot/webgl-heatmap
